author: cskiraly
content:
We are planning to deprecate eth/68 soonish. We are not seeing it used in nodes we run, eth/69 had been out for quite some time, and we are moving on to eth/70 soon. Any objections?
<@741547166656626700> , since when you have eth/69 implemented?

author: cskiraly
content:
> We could: 
> > 1. agree to activate v4+v5 by default on all devnets
v4+v5 is already going on mainnet for most clients. Why not do v5 only on devnets?

> 2. track activation on testnets
By activation do you mean activation on fork boundary? I don't think we have to do the actual behavior change on fork boundary. Or do you mean just general transition risk?  

> 3. discuss it during ACDTs
I had to skip the last one, but we can
